comments.comments_text: Ermin Bicakcic (Hoffenheim) jumped highest inside the box to meet a perfectly executed corner kick by Dennis Geiger. His header was precise and ended up inside the right post, leaving the goalkeeper flapping in the wind. The score is 1:0.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Dennis Geiger (Hoffenheim) was quite harsh and Benjamin Brand didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) was quite harsh and [REFEREE] didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: Joshua Kimmich (Bayern Munich) goes over to take a corner kick after one of the defenders makes a good clearance.

comments.comments_text: Goal! Munas Dabbur (Hoffenheim) dribbles into the box then perfectly lifts the ball over the goalkeeper and into the net. He couldn't do anything to stop that cheeky lob. 2:0.
